pageContext.claim: “I notice some of the people are saying the president has agreed to meet. He has given up so much. I gave up nothing.”
pageContext.analysis: A presidential-level meeting with a rogue regime is generally reserved for the end of a process. With a summit at the front end, Trump conferred legitimacy and status on a leader regarded as one of the world’s worst tyrants. Trump may believe that is unimportant, but most foreign policy experts view it as a significant concession.
